member.name: NMREBARAUTOBREAK
member.summary: Contains information used with the RBN_AUTOBREAK notification code.

member.name: NMREBARAUTOBREAK.hdr
member.summary: structure that provides additional information about this notification code.

member.name: NMREBARAUTOBREAK.uBand
member.summary: Zero-based index of the band affected by the notification. This is -1 if no band is affected.

member.name: NMREBARAUTOBREAK.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value from the lParam member of the structure that defines the rebar band.

member.name: NMREBARAUTOBREAK.fAutoBreak
member.summary: BOOL that indicates whether a break should occur.
